column2: the food didn't taste bad. The mac and cheese and cornbread were bland
column3: but the beans and slaw were just right. Baby back ribs and pulled pork could've used more seasoning. The barbecue sauces were unremarkable. Like I said - not bad
column4: but definitely not what I was expecting given a 4.5 star average. There's a chain in Ohio/Indiana/Kentucky called City Barbeque that blows this place away.
